description:
Start speaking a new language in 3 weeks with Babbel 🎉. Get up to 60% OFF your subscription ➡️ here: https://go.babbel.com/t?bsc=usa-influ-eg-dt-1m&btp=default&utm_term=generic_v1&utm_medium=paidsocial&utm_source=YouTube&utm_campaign=filmento&utm_content=Influencer..Jun-2024..USA-TATAM..1200m60-yt-filmento-jun-2024

Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban is often hyped up as one of the greatest movies on the internet. While I wouldn't go that far, I do agree that it's a very memorable and impactful blockbuster, especially compared to today's movies like Red Notice. And the reason is that it's built on negativity: things are always very bad in it. So, in today's Film Perfection, let's investigate why your movie should be more negative than casually fun.


Book, Amazon: https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0BW1TN97D?ref_=pe_3052080_276849420
Book, PDF: email me at saltyfilmento(a)gmail.com

title: Prisoner of Azkaban — How to Enter the Audience's Head | Film Perfection
